Package it.polimi.vovarini.view

Class ViewData

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.vovarini.view.ViewData
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameDataAccessor, java.io.Serializable
public class ViewData
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, GameDataAccessor
Data that is needed by any kind of view.
